body: Freidel was a mid-century Pennsylvania artist. We found this charming little painting by her while traveling through western New York State. It is signed Katharine Friedel 1957. The frame gives the name of a Greensburg, Pennsylvania framing shop and we were told by the seller that the painting was from an estate in Erie, Pennsylvania. It just caught our eye. It is painted using a delightful color palette and impasto style that makes for a pleasing little winter scene. Itâ€™s perfect for that little niche in your home that needs brightening up.
artOnWallAltText: Katharine Friedel Winter Farmstead Painting For Sale
dimensions: Oil on board, 11.75 x 15.5 inches/Signed lower left
metaTitle: Katharine Friedel Winter Farmstead Painting For Sale
mainImageAltText: Katharine Friedel Winter Farmstead Painting For Sale
metaDescription: Own a piece of beauty with Katharine Friedel's Impressionist view of a farmstead in winter. Discover the serene charm of rural life in this painting.
title: Impressionist's View of a Farmstead in Winter
